text: (Ke kaloku ikumkani) yathi (kubafazi): “Nanibangwa yintoni na ukuba nifune ukuhenda uYûsuf?” Abafazi bathi: “Thixo lo! Akukho kungcola sibaziyo thina ngokuchasene naye!” Umfazi ka-Al-’Azîz wathi: “Ngoku inyaniso ivelile, yayindim owayefuna ukumhenda, ke yena ngokwenene ungowabanyanisekileyo!”
